name: Gold Expressive Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Amber, Sandalwood, Vanilla..Fragrance Description: Rich enough to bathe in, this decadent fragrance is an intoxicating journey to one‚Äôs innermost desires, thoughts, and impulses. Its warm gourmand scent is a luxurious blend of molten Amber, creamy Sandalwood and sweet Vanilla...About the Bottle: The Expressive Collection is an homage to Commodity‚Äôs classic black-and-white bottles. The similar look reflects that Commodity‚Äôs original formulations are now housed within the Expressive Scent Space, and that these middle ground perfumes are the perfect balance of plus and minus...About the Fragrance: Gold has a rich history of being associated with gods, power, beauty and wealth. Its purity exudes luxury and demands a rich sensuality when capturing its essence in liquid form. With its grandeur, Gold Expressive was truly established around a feeling of indulgence.‚ÄîDonna Ramanauskas, Maker...
ingredients: SD Alcohol 40-B (Alcohol Denat.), Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citral...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: - Spritz 1-2 times directly on the pulse points, such as your wrists, inner elbows or sides of the neck. Pulse points are warmer areas of the body that act as natural diffusers when emitting a scent. .- After application, allow the scent to air dry. Rubbing or dabbing will break down a fragrance and cause it to wear off more quickly. .- If you wear fragrance on the wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing. .- Properly store your bottle to extend its shelf life, including recapping after each use and avoiding direct sunlight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! I am sensitive to smells and this one is classic.

reviews.review_text: I love the scent. I did have an issue with commodity before where I bought a travel size from them and it was completely empty, but I had better luck in store. I do wish it lasted longer but other than that I love it. I‚Äôm not very fond of vanilla scents but this is the only vanilla fragrance that I actually love. On me, it smells like a decadent marshmallow lol

I discovered the Commodity perfumes in a Sephora Perfume Sampler set and I was sold. I love the unique scent. It last for about 4 hours or so before having to reapply. I‚Äôm enjoying wearing this new to me fragrance.

reviews.review_title: don‚Äôt blind buy. especially vanilla lovers.

reviews.review_text: not a good blind buy. smells like straight up mahogany teakwood to me. no vanilla/creaminess amongst it. commodity milk is definitely the better vanilla with a bit of mahogany. i don‚Äôt get the amber/sandalwood/musk at all

reviews.review_title: Wish I Could Get it to Last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the fragrance, don't love the lack of longevity. Of course, fragrance sits differently on everyone, but this on my skin has no staying power. Moisturized well, used an oil base and after around 3-4hours unnoticeable. Granted it is a dabber, but still cannot justify a full size bottle. I loved this fragrance the most (out of 3) because it was unlike any others I have. I have been exploring unisex scents and this reminded me of a Moroccan oil for your hair.  Sucks because I really really really love how neutral the fragrance is. Have thought about the bold version, but the notes seem really different. Overall, it is a great, friendly, and unique fragrance.

reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a couple of weeks already, It is not long lasting, but with a little heat it gives off incredible aromas,  I would say it is a discreet, balanced, spicy perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells incredible‚Äîall of my favourite notes combined! Lasting power is crap though, disappears not long after applying it :(

Projection and longevity are a solid medium on my skin, nothing crazy but still noticeable in my immediate vicinity for ~4 hours, and closer to ~6 hours as an intimate skin scent. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: best scent ever this is my everyday scent and it‚Äôs the only fragrance i can wear like that ( i usually get tired of the same scent) but this once you can really notice the changes it takes throughout the dry down 111/10 because it‚Äôs that good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I simply cannot put into words how perfect this scent is üòç if you're doubting it, just go for it. The price tag is a bit expensive for the longevity to only be about 4 hours (with 1 spray, I'm sure it'd last longer with more) but the scent is well worth it. It starts warm and powdery with a bright burst of foresty greens from the Juniper Berries. The dry down is the PERFECT creamy, vanilla, amber. This would be amazing to layer with also, I paired it with Kayali 28 and WOW. I have well over 40 perfumes so it's a big thing to say this makes top 5.

For me, I could smell this well into the next morning. It‚Äôs very rich in amber on the dry-down. Very nice. Great for the winter and fall months.

reviews.review_text: Stunning, warm, sophisticated. That‚Äôs where the good part ends. Absolutely no sillage (I had to press my nose to my skin to smell it), and about an hour of lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is always available as a sample somewhere. I have about 6 of these. I like this, Commodity Gold Expressive, more than the Bold version of this fragrance. It's a subtle smokey marshmallow scent that's long lasting. It's lasts all day, atleast 12 hours. I like to use it after my shower or bath before bed, it's quite a treat to still smell it in the morning even if it's more of a skin scent. As far as projection, those closest to you will enjoy it but you're not going to walk down the street and have many compliments, maybe your cashier or fellow office employees will notice.I don't think it's WOW enough for me to buy the full size but it's nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

It's just lovely and perfect for pretty much every situation. I can't get enough of the scent - it's just so good, warm and feminine but not overly sweet or anything. I also find it to be long-lasting - I apply it in the morning and can still smell it on my skin by late afternoon/evening. Now I don't ever want to be without this, so I have to buy more when I run out!

reviews.review_title: Very soft and elegant warm scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample with a purchase. Been wanting to try fragrances with out commiting to a full bottle. So when I got this sample I wasn't expecting much, however I really enjoy the scent. Has a nice balance of the notes. None overpowering the other so much.  I don't think I will buy a full size bottle for this price. Maybe if they sold travel sizes or if there is a good promo I might consider.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a fragrance that makes you feel powerful and confident, you might want to try Gold Expressive. This is a scent that I bought on a whim, and I was pleasantly surprised by how much I liked it. It has a rich, warm, and spicy aroma that reminds me of luxury and success. It's not too overpowering, but it definitely makes a statement.  One of the things I loved about Gold Expressive was how it made me feel when I wore it. I felt like I could take on any challenge and conquer any obstacle. I felt like a boss, in the best possible way. I enjoyed lathering myself with it before going to work or meeting friends. It gave me a boost of confidence and charisma that I really appreciated.  However, there was one thing that prevented me from giving Gold Expressive a perfect score. The scent didn't last very long on me. It seemed to fade away after a few hours, leaving me disappointed and wanting more. I wish it had more staying power, because I really liked how it smelled. Maybe it's just my skin chemistry, but I felt like it could have been more durable.  Overall, I think Gold Expressive is a great fragrance for anyone who wants to feel assertive and dominant. It has a wonderful smell that is both sophisticated and sensual. It's not for the faint of heart, but for those who want to make an impression. The only downside is that it doesn't last very long, which is a shame. But if you don't mind reapplying it throughout the day, you might love it as much as I do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample of this and I‚Äôve been holding it off bc the packaging is deceiving ‚Ä¶ but when I sprayed myself some of the perfume it surprised me. For some reason it has a  chocolate like smell! Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs a nice vanilla but within 25 minutes I couldn‚Äôt smell it. It just becomes somewhat of a ‚Äúyour skin but better‚Äù fragrance but then even that goes away so quickly. I had to return the same day I brought this because it was too disappointing

This smell so good! If you‚Äôre a woman that love unisex fragrances that don‚Äôt lean more masculine this is a great option. The vanilla is not syrupy sweet, and the wood is not too bold. Just the right balance for a woman to easily wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this scent in a sample I received in the mail however it did not last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this in my order and was excited to try. loved the smell. The longevity was next to nothing. Thought maybe I'd get some compliments on how it smells but you couldn't smell a whole lot unless you directly smelt say my arm.  glad I got to sample it before possibly spending that much money on the actual full sizes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First things first: this is one of few fragrances that doesn't give me a headache. It's very soft! I think it would be suitable for an office because the projection is polite. I would describe this as the grown-up, refined version of the Pink Sugar and Juicy perfume group. For the smell, I think skin chemistry plays a bigger role in this frag. On my skin, the initial smell is a musky, woody, slightly sweet scent. Then it dries down and smells like a very sweet vanilla (I think someone mentioned vanilla frosting, which I think is pretty accurate), with a very soft sandalwood in the middle. I think if you're going for a gourmand with some depth this is a perfect option. On my friend it didn't smell as sweet, more cologne-y, but still feminine.
I got a sample in a different order and IMMEDIATELY bought the full bottle. Usually I just grab a travel size before I commit fully but this was too good not to have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. In my opinion it is very delicious. I think that the ambery and woody notes really have center stage in this fragrance. It is really long lasting, at least in my skin. I will definitely recommend this product to anyone regardless of gender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice rich, slightly sweet, and smooth Sandalwood Vanilla type fragrance with a musky base, to my nose. I received a sample of this fragrance with a recent order.

reviews.review_title: Vacation scent, but not every day
reviews.review_text: The scent is warm and layered. It concentrates on wherever you spray it and it‚Äôs long wearing. The scent doesn‚Äôt permeate beyond where you‚Äôve sprayed it. Some define this as a masculine scent. The sandalwood lends itself to that. I have met men who wear similar style colognes. I find the initial scent overly sweet like a vanilla icing, which can be helpful if you are looking for a masking scent. Vanilla sugar is the dominate scent in the profile. There is something about it that makes it atmospheric. Like the lobby of a boutique hotel in Miami Beach or a department store of fine leather shoes. I will wear this occasionally, but the alcohol isn‚Äôt as balanced as I would want.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and wow. It‚Äôs awful. Genuinely smells like dusty carpet and cigarettes.

Not sure if you need more than one. I think this is very similar to Milk, and I also find this one simple enough for layering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down my favorite vanilla fragrance that feels great to wear on any occasion! It‚Äôs vanilla in the most intriguing, suave way without leaning into that super sweet gourmand direction, a must try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite perfume, reborn!!! I was very dubious about Commodity being relaunched, but I shouldn‚Äôt have been. Gold (expressive) is just like the OG Gold! Not a fan of Gold-/Gold+, but as long as they keep the originally Gold, that‚Äôs all I care about! It‚Äôs the most perfect juniper kissed woody vanilla. If you like ‚ÄúBy the Fireplace‚Äù and ‚ÄúGypsy Water‚Äù, you‚Äôll enjoy ‚ÄúGold‚Äù for sure. Please don‚Äôt ever discontinue this scent, Commodity!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first Commodity purchase and I fell in love. The scent is warm and unique, I get compliments every time I wear it. I have purchased 2 other commodity fragrances since. Amazing!

reviews.review_title: Not for me, but good as a masculine cologne!

When I first sprayed it on myself, I got a very strong vanilla, then it settled nicely then the dry down, on me, smells just like Old Spice. I think this would make a nice cologne. It has  lasted a good amount of time on me, I can still even smell it after washing it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent. However, it smells exactly like vanilla musk by coty LOL

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is literal perfection! It smells so nice, sweet, comforting, and vanilla-y which is my favorite scent profile. It's still unique enough that it isn't like any typical vanilla perfume in the market. It's very original and just so cozy! People can smell it on me which makes me happy and it isn't a smell that bothers people either. It is suttle but its there in the air casually. I just love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gold Expressive is my favorite of the 3 Gold Scent Spaces! The fragrances in the Gold line are Vanilla forward. The Personal is more of a soft, lighter and airier sweet vanilla that sits close to the skin. Expressive is warmer and richer, a little more sweet & creamy, absolutely beautiful and my favorite, its not crazy strong by you can smell it throughout the day. Bold is very different from the other 2, heavier and with added spices. I personally do not enjoy Bold at all. Gold Expressive is perfect in my opinion, had the right amount of depth without being too much. Performance is good too, it's not extremely long lasting but does last for several hours. Full bottle worthy out of the 3 Golds!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Commodity fragrances! Especially this one! It‚Äôs such a warm and loving fragrance it feels you are getting a big hug! I would describe this as a gourmand vanilla!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Warm, sexy scent. Doesn‚Äôt at all smell musty to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Listen, coming from a perfume snob - someone who is a deep explorer of niche fragrances over that of designer / more easily purchasable perfume, I from time to time enjoy basic, well-rounded perfumes. I was pleasantly surprised at how much I enjoyed Gold Expressive on the tester strip, it smelled like a less sickeningly smoky version of By The Fireplace for reference. It smells like a vanilla, baked good in the fall/winter season. However, the projection, village and overall longevity of this fragrance is comically horrendous, and does not merit the price. This fragrance or that of the Personal line would likely be great bedtime fragrances where you can spray it on, feel good, connect with the colder seasons and not be overwhelmed by the scent in bed. This is not a fragrance I'd expect to last more than an hour at any time, so if that is a detriment, which it certainly is for me, then I'd go for a more potent vanilla fragrance. One recommendation I have would be Angelique Noire from Guerlain (significantly more expensive) or Vanillaa Diorama from Dior Privee (Also quite pricey) for the best, long-wearing, stunning vanilla.

reviews.review_text: I am not a perfume person, but I am picky and I do like intricate scents when it comes to perfume. Hate florals with s burning passion.  I got gifted a booklet of tiny sample sizes of all of the Commodity scents, and I decided to try each on throughout a month and see what I do and don't like, and after that time of testing them all out, I reached back to Gold over and OVER.   It's very gender-neutral in my opinion, something that you'd love to smell on a boyfriend, or a girlfriend. Sweet and warm, but also a bit earthy and musky at the same time. It makes me visualize a wood cottage out in the mountains mid-winter, sitting on a leather couch decorated with pelts, in front of a roaring fireplace. This is a very unique scent to me, and it's so addicting too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sexy and masculine, love this one. I just wish it lasted a little longer. If you like Nirvana Black you‚Äôll love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing but sadly the sent does not stay on for long and for the cost of the perfume it should. I returned it for this reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the smell of this fragrance when I received it as a sample.  I purchased the full size bottle the following week.  I still love the smell, but it doesn't last AT ALL.  It makes me sad, because it's expensive and I need to reapply throughout the day.  I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually get tired of perfumes quickly, but not this one. The more I wear it the more I love it. It is everything that I want from a perfume. It smells like vanilla, but in a sophisticated and not overly sweet way. After going through three travel size bottles of this I'm finally buying a full size version from the VIB sale. I can't see myself ever getting tired of this, so I hope they never discontinue it! It also layers beautifully with other perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample from Sephora and then bought a travel size to put in my travel toiletry bag.  When I noticed that I was digging out the travel size, I bought the fullsize.  I like the light and sweet sent for work.  It makes me think of innocence.  However, I recently noticed that it doesn't last throughout the day and I am not longer using it daily.  Maybe I'm just tired of it.  I am still looking for a signature scent.  This is not it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok guys, when first sprayed i actually hate the smell! LOL!  But I walked by some more of the perfume, smelled my wrist again and went WOW! Totally amazing as it set on my skin, am definitely a fan now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love.Love.LOVE!!! Long lasting, very unique and does not give me a headache. It has a sweet light scent that for some reason reminds me of bonfires and marshmallows. A new favorite of mine.

reviews.review_title: I need it in all the things.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazingly luxe and decadent and lasts forever. The scent evolves over time and makes me feel like a queen. I wish they had a hair mist. And a bath bomb. And bath oils. Basically, I want my entire life to smell like this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I hate the smell of alcohol in perfumes which is another reason I love this. Once it dries down, there is no scent of alcohol just the sweet smell of caramel and vanilla. Finally I can smell like a snack, while looking like a snack.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful warm scent! Long lasting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this fragrance sooooo much!  I love my florals  (if they‚Äôre not TOO sweet)....but I also love my warm vanilla scents like Gold (and I‚Äôm also superbly fond of Tom Ford‚Äôs Soleil Blanc). This Gold though.  It‚Äôs sooooo good!  Not sure about longevity?  Many are saying it doesn‚Äôt last.  Seems to last fine on me.  Sephora graciously sent me a lovely surprise package of summer fragrances (#summerscents), and Commodity‚Äôs ‚ÄúNectar‚Äù was one of them.  Loved Nectar for a beautiful summertime fragrance,,..and if you later Gold over Nectar....it‚Äôs totally another yummy unique fragrance.  Try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: you just smell delicious

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: what a fantastic scent. I've been getting compliments from strangers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gold is one of my favorite Commodity perfumes! The scent lasts all day, isn't overwhelming, and has a dreamy, rich scent. I wear it every day. I always get compliments and am frequently asked what I'm wearing!  The only issue I have had is with the travel size sprays. I purchased 3 online through Sephora (on separate occasions) and every single one had leaked though the packaging, leaving an empty vial. I don't know if the cap and spray is too flimsy, but it was beyond disappointing to receive an item like that, more than once. Sephora was helpful in exchanging the items for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome perfume for the work place!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very subtle.  This will be my go to fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wear this stuff literally everyday and have barely made a dent in the bottle. Definitely powerful and lasts on my skin all day. My absolute favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite perfume. Once I put it on its like heaven.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm not good at the perfume lingo but I wanted to give this a review since I love it so much. Gold is amazing. The vanilla scent and whatever else is mixed in there is perfect. It lasts all day but not in a walk by someone or walk in the room and smell it up kind of way. I tuck my hair behind my ear and get a whiff or deliberately smell my wrist. My children smell it when they hug me. I told them both how good it smelled and had them smell it and they both were wowed. He is 8 and she is 3. I use to have numerous scents across all the different families but after having kids and increased allergies it is hard to find something I want to smell all day, even if I like it. I wouldn‚Äôt mind if air smelled this way. I did get a sample but after I purchased the Commodity Storybook. I will never have enough of this and plan to buy the bottle before I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample with my last purchase, and I am so glad I did! Warm and interesting. I will be purchasing this one next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love him! I came in a sample and from there I had to buy it, it is difficult to find a perfume that lasts all day but this yes, smells delicious is sweet, but not to the extreme, a delicate and fine smell,whenever I use someone has to ask me which perfume use , it really doesn't bother me at all the price, this perfume if it's worth it, you want to buy it? Do not think this PERFUME is the glory!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found this scent pretty... light and fresh... for me there has to be a little almost undefinable something that makes me fall in love with a scent... this one did not have that something... perhaps a brightness is missing .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't normally like anything described as having an amber or musk smell, but I am in love with this!!!  I got it as a sample and am buying the full size immediately.  The first time I tried the sample I was blown away by how warm and inviting it smells.  Even after wearing for a few days I still keep sniffing my wrist because it's just that good.  The powdery vanilla scent is perfect, somehow both simple and complex at the same time.  I usually switch between a few favorites, but I think this has just become my full time fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just randomly picked this sample as one w my last order not thinking I would like it at all since I am very picky about my fragrances. My current favorite is Gucci guilty and now this! I tend to like more musky cologne smelling fragrances. This one is amazing and it reminds me of what the cosmo in Vegas smells like if you've ever been there. I'm in love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this perfume. warm, vanilla scent lasts all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Im always aimlessly searching for a new vanilla scent and let me add that i am VERY picky. I prefer to search for my perfumes by my lonesome with no needed assistance.  To my surprise, a sephora employee pointed this out to me. My first impression was, oh! this is way too fancy, but i found myself picking it up and smelling it about 10 times back to back. I was wrong, it is not too fancy for me. I judged it too soon, let it settle and dry and it smells like GOLD (perfect name). This is my new PERFECT going out scent that has my precious creamy vanilla swirled in. I went home with a sample and was so obsessed i later bought the travel size. Its almost gone and im most definately purchasing a full size. I wore this during my stay in vegas with my girlfriends and now all i can think of is vegas-sexy, sun, money, sweet temptation. I couldnt pass up sharing a review because this perfume is so amazing to me. LOVE! Its a strong enough and beautiful enough scent to be worn alone, but something i like and would recommend for a summery beachy vibe is to top it with Bobbi Browns, beach.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been searching for my scent for years, tried so many different perfumes. This. Is. It. I get compliments on it all the time, and no one can quite define the smell but just that it's good. I read one review that said it's like a grown up vanilla and I think that is bang on. Not too sweet, not too musky, just a beautiful, sophisticated fragrance. I'll be buying another one as soon as mine runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent. Normally not a fan of vanilla scented perfumes, but this is definitely a major exception. It's sweet on application but dries to a neutral feminine scent. So glad I tried this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is warmth and scentuality and the line between feminine softness and musky magnetism. Never want to be without it. Dang it. Have to put some more on now thinking about it. I mist the bed sometimes with it. Incredible, addicting scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this scent!! It is very warm, with a lean on vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the mini spray and love it so much I‚Äôm considering purchasing the full size. If you love vanilla scents you‚Äôll love this. It‚Äôs warm and not too sweet. It‚Äôs lasts on my body about 4-5 hours but stays in my clothes all day. It reminds me of sitting in front of a fireplace while eating a vanilla sugar cookie ‚ù§Ô∏è I know this is meant to be layered with other scents in the Commodity line but I don‚Äôt care I love to wear it all by itself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually like warm or gourmand scents; this is very different from others in that family. This is my absolute favorite scent for date nights and formal office events. It's unique, absolutely beautiful and fresh enough not to be overpowering. I'll definitely be keeping this in stock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is definitely one of my new favorites. My husband absolutely loves it. It smells of molten amber, benzoin, and vanilla. It is a very warm wintery scent. It is very similar to warm vanilla sugar by bath and body but much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On first try out of the box it just smells like running alcohol! I can't detect ANY vanilla at all! Super disappointed in this one :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful neutral scent that pairs flawlessly with other fragrances or smells heavenly on it's own. Lightly sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't often have a fragrance wardrobe: I have this weird body chemistry where a scent may smell great in the bottle or on the paper or on someone else, but I get it home and it just doesn't work. I tried the travel size, and I'm in love. I know what notes I like, but the bottom line depends on how the fragrance dries down on my skin. I wore the same fragrance for years, it's no longer being made. I found this after months of searching. It has a gentle vanilla/spicy smell that works for me; I cannot wear florals at all. It is not overpowering or overly sweet; I do not like when  fragrance wears me. I can wear this everyday, feel like it smells like me. Fragrance is an investment to me. If it were less expensive, that would be great, and i'm not sure I need to spend $300 on a bottle of perfume. But this product will last for a year, perhaps? So it's an investment I'm willing to make. I asked friends for their opinion, people who would say that's too strong or nope, keep looking. I get compliments from people who don't like fragrance. That's a winner for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the warmth and the smoothness of this long lasting scent. One of my new favorites and I consider myself a ‚Äúfragrance snob‚Äù. I don‚Äôt like any fragrance that you can buy at 30 different places in the mall, discount store,

reviews.review_title: Have to use twice, sometimes 3 times, as much.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I. Love. The. Smell. Delicate, warm, vanilla, and amber but it barely carries. I have to use twice, sometimes 3 times, as much to even get a small amount of joy. I‚Äôm accustomed to a stronger scent that comes through. This might be more the case with the large bottle and not the samples or travel size. Or if you need a barely there scent this might be a good fit. I won‚Äôt buy it again which makes me sad because the smell is so delicious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am totally obsessed and wish I hadn't LOVED it so much.  It is very difficult to describe, but I'll start off with the type of scents I tend to gravitate towards.  I wear Flowerbomb, ysl black opium, Michael kors Sexy Amber, jadore, tocca florence, u get the picture.  The latest favorite was MK Amber, and I still love it but this one seems to be safer for the everyday office.  When I first put it on for my husband to sniff on me the first word out of his mouth was  mmmmmm creamsicle, which I wouldn't have ever thought of.  We all smell different descriptions, but I took his as a compliment since he is a very simple man who hates perfumes/colognes but his favorite ice cream is a creamsicle : )  I know this is a winner bc he usually coughs with disgust and waves at the air whenever I spray any perfume to go to work, but not with this.  This is warm, soothing, and pleasant.  It's not a snowstorm, but a lovely fluffy soft layer on your skin.  It's not a full on sexy, but definitely can be on the sexual spectrum with a mysterious you may not see me, but you feel me atmosphere.  I can smell the not so heavy vanilla bean and other notes.  I was close to giving this 4 stars only bc I wish it were a tiny tiny bit more heavier, but then again that might change everything that's so great about it.  For me, it doesn't last all day long, but maybe that's just my chemistry.  I plan to layer it and take it from there.  I will be buying the full bottle since my sample is gone.  my newest obsession. .....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a total five star all the way!! It's one of those rare perfumes that smell like it wasn't chemically concocted in a lab, but instead like the smell of the earth on a warm day. If they made a candle version of this, I would literally have it attached to my face all day long! Totally worth the buy, and is definitely a repeat purchase...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first smell I really wasn't into this at all.  It was reminiscent to me of something my grandmother had in her jewlery box. Floury and heady...not at all as the description reads.  I put it aside and went back to my favourite scent by Commodity - Book.  I'm so glad that I tried it on again later on a whim! Once it's on, it develops into a lovely, spicy-(not too) sweet smell. A bit of vanilla and bourbon that really comes out once on the skin.  It's not cloyingly gourmande.  I will definitely be buying this again in the larger size once I run out of the smaller travel one I have (which will be soon!).  My only complaint is that the scent doesn't last as long as I'd like.  By the time I'm into the afternoon at work I can't smell it at all.  Seems to be a problem with most of the Commodity scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thought I hated vanilla fragrances till I encountered Gold. Sumptuous, rich, intoxicating. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a long-lasting scent that didn't break the bank. I've been wearing Nirvana Bourbon and Dolce The One for a while, but needed something new. This scent is perfectly warm and a bit spicy, and lasts a long time. The price is moderate and seems very fair for how long the product lasts. It's a gorgeous scent that I suggest you try in person!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume. I own 2 travel sprays and the large bottle. It isn't something that I wear year round, but it is perfect for fall and winter. This is such a warm, sexy scent. I will put it on in the morning after my shower and can still smell it the next morning.  That being said, it is not overpowering. It just has great staying power. Fans of Nirvana Black, Amethyst and Bourbon, Victor and Rolf Flowerbomb will love it. I can not recommend it enough. My husband rarely comments on my perfume, but he does every time I wear this one. He loves it as much as I do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is just indulging! The warm scent of vanilla and the infusion on your skin... nothing but good vibes. I get compliments every time I wear it. Such a nice scent! Definitely a must buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: easily one of my new favorites scents! smells amazinggggg, the perfect mixture of amber and vanilla, and the staying power is fantastic!

reviews.review_title: Like Prada Candy? You'll love Commodity Gold
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing Prada Candy for four years now, and had never found anything I loved as it. Well, I went into the fragrance section just to look around and the employee I met was very kind about showing me perfumes that she thought I might be interested in. In the end, she showed me this one, and I have never been happier.   It has a sweet, warm, spicy-vanilla scent that I absolutely adore and get several compliments on. Seriously, as if going to a bar as a single female is not bad enough.

I absolutely adore this smell, it is warm amber, cozy vanilla, and spicy bourbon in a bottle, and it's my perfect fragrance. My only issue is its staying power - I don't notice the smell on my skin after a couple of hours, and for how much money I spent on it, I feel that I should be able to smell it on me all day. Don't regret buying it, just wish it lasted a little longer.

I'm someone who is very prone to migraines, and I constantly struggle to find spray perfumes that don't trigger a headache. This perfume is just delightful! It's a creamy, not saccharine sweet, vanilla scent that has an olfactory fuzzy quality that imparts a cozy aura around the wearer.  The perfume IS light, but I find that the sillage is still noticeable to those around me, and it lasts for many hours before fading into a very soft skin scent. The fragrance is never in-your-face pungent but it stays with you throughout the day. It's hard for me to imagine anyone being offended by this perfume as it doesn't veer into full gourmand territory, and the fragrance doesn't smell synthetic in the slightest.  It layers beautifully with my usual Persian Garden perfume oil, and I think it wears beautifully on its own for someone who wants to smell pleasant and not overly perfumed.

This is my absolute favorite perfume, and has been my go-to scent for a few years now. It's a very simple, elegant gourmand that's perfect for layering or wearing around the office when you don't want to invade everyone's space with your scent. It sticks to clothes nicely, and I can still smell it at the end of the day. I see a lot of people complaining that it's too subtle--if you like migraine inducing levels of scent overload, this probably isn't for you.

I got this in my Scentbird subscription after coming across the Commodity line. I liked that they market as unisex scents. I have NEVER liked traditional womens perfume. I prefer a much manlier smell but lets be honest i cant really just wear mens cologne around lol. I tried this and it is the perfect balance of man and woman. Its light and fresh but stays on the skin/clothing. The packaging is great and high quality. It comes in a heavy glass container with a nice mister. I will happily repurchase this again and again.

reviews.review_title: One of My Two All Time Favorite Perfumes
reviews.review_text: Reviewing a perfume is kind of a moot point given that scent is very personal and emotional. One's Cloud 9 can be another's Malebolge, but to those who enjoy this fragrance family, I consider this a sister fragrance to Prada Candy. While Prada Candy is the fun party girl, Commodity Gold is the elegant femme fatale. It has this warm and cozy powdery scent that just wraps around you like a soft blanket fresh out of the dryer, and every time I smell it I can't help but smile. This is a perfume that inspires a profound kind of happiness in me, and I recommend you at least try a spritz.
I purchased this scent on a whim and receive compliments all day! It's delicious and layers well with many different scents. My favourite is layering with Tom Fords Soleil Blanc- amazing!

I love this sent. its my all time favorite. it very unique and can be paired with almost anything. but its really good on it's on. that said. for price i wish it last longer or there was a bit of a stronger version. other than that... this is a very beautiful sent to add to one's collection.

I love warm vanilla fragrances but sometimes they can veer a little too cloyingly sweet for me.  This manages to keep the vanilla in check and while it is sweet, it's not sickeningly so.  The spices in the scent ground it and creates a nice balance.  It reads as a warm, rich and inviting fragrance and not as an achingly sweet, overpowering and suffocating one.  I wear this all seasons but it's my favorite in the Winter.  It sounds silly but a few spritzes of this on a bitterly cold day, warms me right up.

If you like fragrances like Lancome Tresor, D&G The One, CoCo by Chanel, and By The Fireside by Maison Margiela, this is the fragrance for YOU! I love to wear this on top of my Summer Marshmallow lotion from BBW it is an amazing vanilla-y musky amber scent & I am in love.

I'm not quite sure to describe this. It's sort of spicy, sort of earthy, but clean.  It's also quite subtle. It's unlike anything else I've ever worn, but it is certain to become one of my go to scents.

reviews.review_title: Warm, inscensy, comforting, stays close to the ski
reviews.review_text: It's not often I find a commercial perfume that isn't rank, too sugary, or based on cool water. This stuff is liquid gold. Seriously, it feels like being embraced in a warm, snuggly hug. If you're familiar with Satya Natural incense, this is a bit like that. Warm, a little spicy, comforting, and meshes really well with skin.

I usually play it safe when it comes to fragrances. If it isn't a clean or vanilla scent then I usually don't go for it. This is the perfect transition into something new! It still has my favorite scents, but they're paired with some new and exciting notes as well. Oh, how I wish there was a lotion in the scent!

What a lovely surprise! This is definitely a new favorite of mine! It is sweet, invokes a warm and fuzzy feeling... and my husband loves it! Also has great staying power. So thrilled with this new addition to my collection!
this perfume is a must have in any collection were vanilla is a favorite scent of the purchaser. the perfume last all day and is not over whelming.

I love the warmth and depth of the scent. It works great with my body chemistry, and I could see wearing it all year long. However, on me it smells exactly D&G's The One. I already have that fragrance so this really doesn't add anything new to my repertoire.

wow. I literally just got this in my Sephora package.. one spray on my neck and HOLY SH** THIS PERFUME IS LITERAL SEX IN A BOTTLE. If you like warm scents like Giorgio Armani Si, any perfume either notes of vanilla or amber etc, this is for you. You will 100% be getting compliments on this scent.

I was very impressed with the staying power on this one. One spritz on my shirt and I could smell it all day. This perfume is very reminiscent of Nest's White Sandalwood (which is my favorite out of the Nest line). At first it smells like a creamsicle then dies down very sweet, but not overpowering.
This perfume is my absolute favourite and I haven't been able to find any other ones that I like better. It has a lovely, warm vanilla drydown and I can't stop smelling myself omggg

This smells amazing. I layer it with Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille body spray. They complement one another very well. If you ever been to the spa at the Wynn in Vegas, that's what the two scents layered smell like. It's intoxicating and you just want to roll around in it.  My only gripe with this brand is the packaging; it's so fragile. I've broken one travel size by dropping it, out of my bag, from just two feet and I broke the large 3.4oz bottle by dropping it from just three inches onto my bathroom counter. BE CAREFUL WITH THE BOTTLES

This perfume is so beautiful and warm that occassionally i'll get a whiff of it and not realize that it's me that smells so good. I get compliments on it all the time. It's a very warm vanilla scent and gold is the perfect name for it. I'm about to buy my third bottle which I've never done with a perfume.

This perfume smells almost like a sweet vanilla with slight musk. It smells warm and cozy but not too sweet. If you like si and ysl black opium chances are you will like this. Purchased the travel then then full size and just ordered the whole trail set to smell the others

The first perfume I fell in love with. I has a nice bright and warm scent. It definitely lifts your mood. While I used to wear it on its own, I not love to layer iit with other scents from Commodity (Gin and Moss)  and Maison Mergiela (Replica: Fireside). It definitely brings out the depth of complimentary scents.

I got a sample many months ago with an order and fell so hard for this. I started out with the travel size. I love the lightness of the vanilla because I'm actually not a huge fan of straight vanilla scents. This one has an edgy sandalwood/vanilla sort of scent. I spray it on my wrists, neck, and in my hair. I do think it tends to wear off a bit too soon, but I can't stop wearing it. My 13 son always says how much he likes it when I spritz it on before we head out in the morning. It's not a juvenile scent though ;)

Typically, I am a feminine floral perfume gal (think Diptyque's Eau Rose; Chloe's Chloe; Chanel Chance Eau Tendre; Chloe's Love Story; you get the picture), so what a surprise it was that I gravitated to this comforting vanilla-ish perfume from Commodity. Mind you, I also enjoy their Whiskey, Moss, Wool, and Mimosa, so I'm just loving this line, but I must say that this Gold scent is one I could use on a daily basis for the Fall and Winter months. When this is the main scent and you spritz some other perfume from Commodity's line (I've so far tried a good layer of Gold with a light spritz of Whiskey, Moss, or Wool, and each variation works well with my body chemistry), you end up smelling distinctively good, unique, and special. I am so happy to have discovered this line from Sephora and can't wait to take the full plunge and get myself the 3.4 oz bottle of Gold.

reviews.review_title: If You're Tired of Strong Flowery Perfumes
reviews.review_text: a woodsy (think sandalwood), slightly musky scent I find very appealing
I sprayed this on my wrists today in store, even received a sample. Immediately fell in love with this warm, cozy scent that I purchased the full size bottle. A great scent for fall & winter!

I had to get used to the scent at first it was strong at first. I'm usually into light fruity floral perfumes, and was looking for a warm and spicy fragrance for fall/winter. The scent is very simple yet very beautiful. When it settles on my skin it i feel like I'm near a fire place. I will probably layer this fragrance with one of my more fruity floral scents to add more depth. All in all it is worth the buy.

I had the pleasure of trying the Commodity range at a local boutique before they hit Sephora a couple of years ago. I forget which sent I first smelled (it was either Mimosa or Rain), but I was instantly hooked. I did not purchase that day, mainly because of the price tag, however when I saw the entire range at Sephora some time later, I decided to impulse buy. I decided to go with Gold without trying first because I was more interested in a warm scent.   This scent is warm, however it is somewhat unidimensional. I have not tried layering it with other Commodity fragrances, however, on it's own, it's pleasant, however, it is just a little blah at times.

reviews.review_title: Love Doesn't Even Begin to Describe...
reviews.review_text: This fragrance it truly amazing. It is so warm, sexy and sophisticated yet not too heavy for daily wear. There hasn't been a day that I've worm it without receiving multiple compliments. The company itself is great and their fragrance library includes many unique scents that can be worn alone or layered.  *TIP: Sorry Sephora but when ordering from the Commodity website, you can choose to order a large bottle or two travel sprays. Before you choose your fragrance(s), they send you their entire kit of samples ($22 at Sephora) for free! You can try a new scent everyday and even create your own cocktails. Once you decide, you redeem the scent of your choice. It's pretty great :)
I first received this fragrance in the Commodity Cocktail Kit, and I absolutely fell in love with it. I recently bought this bottle here and I love it so much. Great product!!

This scent is perfection. It's at once warm and sweet, sexy and playful. And it LASTS. As comparison, I love Prada Candy as well, but it has zero staying power. If you like musky, vanilla-y, sweet, yet not cloying, you'll dig this!
This is such a great unisex scent. I love Commodity!!

reviews.review_title: My new signature - just wish it were stronger
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing Hanae Mori Butterfly for as long as I can remember, and am a favor of all things vanilla/gourmand. This one is amazingly warm, sweet but not cloying...other reviews have likened the scent to being enveloped in a hug and that's a great description. This scent would get five stars from me if it were a touch more intense. Even freshly sprayed, you have to get right up to the skin in order to smell it - which actually makes it perfect for daily/office wear. I purchased the rollerball size, and will be purchasing the full size. Not sure about layering it...I actually did try it in the store with Wool because they both have vanilla and vetiver notes. However, I found Wool to be so masculine, it completely overtook Gold.
I just love this. It is sweet and a little smokey. Love it
I'm on love with this fragrance! I actually layer it with Tory Butch and it's amazing! I've definitely found my signature scent!

I LOVE this perfume! It's so light and sweet, but isn't sugary or cheap smelling. I get complimented on it at least once a week. I can't imagine not having this be my signature scent. I can't wait to pick up one of the black collection perfumes, and try mixing them up a bit!

I wear this daily as a stand alone scent and LOVE it. Warm and sexy, without being overpowering for an office environment. I've worn Chanel Chance, Dolce The One, and others, but this is my current favorite. It took me a second to actually purchase the full size, but I'm glad I did!

This is not what I would expect a scent called Gold to smell like. It is a very warm and creamy scent. The strongest notes, in order, are Benzoin, Tonka Bean and vanilla. I like it but just not what I expected at all. I would expect something called Gold to be sophisticated and elegant but this has none of those characteristics. It reminds me of baking cupcakes or cookies with my grandma or like I just stepped into the local cupcake shop...cupcakes and buttercream icing, yes. Gold, no way.

reviews.review_title: Love using this solo and as a mixer
reviews.review_text: This scent evokes warmth and sexiness. One spritz over a spicy citrus fragrance creates an irresistible sensorial experience. Love using this solo as well!  Grabbed the full size and the travel to keep this handy :)
This is easily my favorite scent ever now. I got a free sample of it in the summer and I've been obsessed ever since. It's light but still very fragrant.
Love how this smells. It's like a blend of vanilla mixed in with a Tahitian getaway.

reviews.review_title: the scent is heavenly, longevity not so much
reviews.review_text: Why must all the dreamy perfumes wear off so fast? I spray this on my clothing to keep the scent longer. For some reason I feel like most perfume doesnt last on my skin. What's a girl to do? I keep buying them bec I love the smell. This perfume makes me feel sexy, dreamy, loved, warm..just a sensory hug. I do rcv compliments when wearing, so maybe my peripheral sense of smell is blown..lol this is a new favorite of mine. Would love it in a candle.

Not normally a gourmand lover but Gold is just beautiful. I think that the reason I like it is because it isn't overly sweet that becomes sickly but it is still warm.  I don't get any of the citrus/fruity notes, I get mainly the warm notes: amber, benzoin, sandalwood, vanilla and tonka bean. It is creamy and cozy.  I would say it is more appropriate for the colder months but not too heavy that it can't be worn all year round. From the white collection from commodity, this one is my favorite.

I received this as a part of the Commodity trial kit. I really wanted to like this one. The smell was alright, it reminded me of Moroccan hair oil and I could see it working for summer, I suppose. What really annoyed me is how terribly it lasted. Within an 2.5 hours  the scent was gone. Most certainly not worth the $120 price tag for a full bottle! You're better off using Moroccan hair oil. PASS.
This is now my go-to fragrance, especially when I'm wanting to impress. It smells warm, in that good like-your-skin-but-better way. Whenever I wear it I always get compliments. Definitely recommend.

I tend to go toward scents that aren't heavy, because I am extremely active on a daily basis and around people all day long, so my scent has to be present without overpowering. This one fits everything I love in a scent into one small bottle!! It is a balance between a richly-feminine smell and a tobacco-esq men's cologne. My main-stay perfume was Kenneth Cole New York Women, in the gold, circular bottle, which was discontinued years ago--and this is pulling to replace that now. Plus, a little goes a LONG way, which I think everyone can appreciate!
I received this as a sample a few months ago. I fell in love. Just got it for Christmas and can't wait to wear it.

I am very impressed! I am a perfume only for special occasions kind of gal but I have been wearing this one every day for three days straight since it arrived! It smells old-fashioned in the cap (a little like a scent my grandmother wore) but stunning on my skin, warm without being overly sweet. It also lasts forever - I wake up with the smell still lingering on my skin. As a comparison, my other prefered perfume is Coco Mademoiselle by Chanel.
I am in love!!! As soon as I sprayed this I knew I had to have a bottle. This perfume passes through several beautiful phases as it dries down. It is warm, yet light, Familiar, yet sexy.
In loveeee. If you like Dolce's The One or warm vanilla fragrances, just buy it. Smells classy, wears so well and I can smell it all day. Love this perfume!
Smells so soft. Not overbearing. An everyday perfume.

reviews.review_title: One of the nicer in the Commodity line
reviews.review_text: Commodity is interesting. The idea of Whiskey and Books as scents is intriguing. The layering idea is cool too-- if perhaps too transparent as a way to make money. They all smell slightly the same, really. Gold is probably the nicest. After a while it all gets overwhelming-- the wool, the magnolia, the tea, etc. I suggest they do what Etat did-- make a series of vials and sell them like that, so people can sample them out, and Commodity can charge a low, fair price for the series.

I received this as a sample and fell in love it truly smells great on me especially through out the day it does fade nicely. I find if I spray it in my hair a little it last much longer it's just such a warm sensual smell and the notes of vanilla smell so good!!
Received as a sample, smells fantastic from the cap, however it will not spray for me, so that is disappointing. Can't say if it lasts, or how it wears. That is why I only gave it a 3 star rating.

reviews.review_title: Love yit yet hesitant to buy again...
reviews.review_text: I think the small is fantastic, earthy and warm, yet rich and sexy. I purchased a smaller portion and sprayed it just twice and looked down and bottle was pretty much half empty. disappointing.

This is my first review, but I feel so strongly about this perfume, I had to share. I received this as a sample & immediately fell in love. I wore it to work & 3 girls at my office commented incredibly positively about it. The ladies are from all different age ranges, so it has appeal among generations. For me, it lasted for several hours & I caught subtle whiffs of it most of the day, which made me fall more in love with it. The other point is that is a warm scent that has slight floral undertones with amber, but the vanilla is faint & doesn't leave you smelling like a sugar cookie, which is a problem with many warm fragrances. At the end of the day, my 23 year-old assistant, emailed me to request the name of the scent because she fell in love too!!

Received a sample of this and it was love immediately. My impressions of this scent are that it is warm, genuine, amber, vanilla without being too bakery-inspired. It really does have a scent that brings to mind wealth, big marble halls, gilded frames, a vault full of gold coins. I just love it. Very surprising, and so pleasant. With my particular chemistry it definitely lasts. Definitely ready to try other Commodity scents!

I'm new to the world of fragrances and have been trying to find my scent over the last few months. After trying more than a dozen perfumes that I didn't care for, Gold was the first that made me think, ah, yes! when I smelled it. It's rich and warm, and it feels luxurious. The only trouble is that it wears really close to the body and has very little longevity; it fades to a very faint warm scent after just an hour or two.

I'm in love with this. Received the sample in the mail. Me & my bf both thought it smelled amazing. Super classy. Definitely a fall scent in my opinion. Something I'd where to an interview or when I'm trying to look especially powerful && professional. But in a good way. After the first couple wiffs I was worried it was for men, because of the slight masculine hint. But, after a few moments. And my bfs input. Not a men's cologne. Much more feminine. Will definitely be purchasing full size here soon.

Received a sample of this with my last Sephora order. I love gourmand and amber scents for the fall and winter, so I thought I'd like this. It is sweet and the amber does come through, but it's also completely uninteresting. And it has zero lasting power. Commodity fragrances are supposed to be layered, from what I understand, so maybe that would improve Gold, but on its own, it smells like disappearing, pleasantly sweet, amber water. Def not worth the money for a full bottle.

I just received a sample of this fragrance and I really like it a lot. It smells amazing, it has a bit of a masculine underscore, but with plenty of feminine love to envelope around it. By no means will you smell like a gent ladies... and I have found that to attract men like gang busters. I bought Alien on a whim 4 months ago which has the exact type of scent set up, slight masculine to plenty of feminine and men follow me on the steets of NYC just to tell me I smell amazing, women also comment on it to, I have never experienced anything like it. So, I feel wearing Gold, although it smells nothing at all like Alien will attract the same attention. Furthermore, I am a fragrance geek, I own at least 150 perfumes ranging in price from 39.00 to 300.00 and I research what goes into them to create the smell. Basically I love perfume, and believe I have an excellent nose... If you end up buying this fragrance I don't believe you'll be disappointed as long as it works with your chemistry! This is not fruity/floral at all. It's rich, and smells rich and expensive, like Gold :)
I received this as a sample and had to buy the full size. It is a wonderful fragrance full of essential oil scents. Definitely for someone who is into the more natural scents.

This perfume is so boring. I wouldn't say it's for an older woman but for someone who wants a subtle fragrance and prefers for people to not notice them. It has no umph and is very flat and synthetic. Older women come from a time when perfume was complex and vibrant.....this is the exact opposite of that. It almost smells a tad bit masculine....a wimpy masculine scent.

reviews.review_title: Light, yet bold. Good for summer and autumn
reviews.review_text: I am having a hard time describing Gold. When I first spritzed it, my mood was immediately elevated to a happy strata. The scent is like a bottle of Italian bubbly that is both dry and sweet, warm but uplifting. It seems to be opposites at the same moment.  It is a warm, chic gourmand that isn't cloying. It is a light, sweet and warm wearable musk that doesn't evoke the heavy, earthy musks of the 1970s. Gold reaches across generations because my high school senior and I both enjoy it.  Longevity is fairly good at about three to five hours. Silage is very close to the body, then again, I only apply the scent lightly for summer usage.

Gold is a warm, soothing and comforting breath of fresh air amongst the walking fruit salad bowls and hyper-feminine flower bombs that herd the streets these days. It has presence without being obnoxious and I love it for that. A true gem of modern perfumery!
This smell is warm and smells like a bakery; not a smell I want to experience all day
I got a sample of this and I didn't like it. It smell like sweet coconut mixed with medicine. I guess maybe it's good for old people.
This scent, in my opinion, is more fitting of an older woman. The warm notes lack the brightness that I would desire in a scent, but I did get it as a free sample.

Soft, semi-sweet. Never overwhelming no matter how much you put on. Could still smell it 3 hours later. Cross between a bakery and honey suckle garden; if that makes sense.... Any who, I am in love with it. My new favorite.

Notes of bergamot, amber, and light vanilla lead this scent, and more floral notes follow. I tried all the Commodity fragrances, and liked all of them (especially Tea!). Gold was the one I knew I would wear the most, though. It's universally flattering - sexy and feminine without being to sultry for daytime. I wanted something I could wear every day and not get tired of and this is definitely it. I must note the spray on the bottle is really great - I feel like it disperses the fragrance better than any other perfume bottle I own. My one big complaint: it's not very concentrated and it doesn't last or linger. Some people may find this as a 'pro' because it also means it's not overpowering. I feel that if you're paying $100 a bottle, I want the scent to linger until at least the afternoon. Overall, a total win.

This does, indeed, feel luxurious - but not in an ostentatious way. It has a quality to it that somehow feels like thick heat, but maybe you're wearing the perfect airy outfit so everything just melts together perfectly. Definitely doesn't feel like it weighs you down, but has enough depth that so that it lasts longer than other fragrances. Love it, and have been wearing it almost every day since I bought it
Lovely and light, with a floral undertone that isn't too overwhelming. Nicely blended overall.

This smells a lot like Replica's Jazz Club but with a slightly warmer note- vanilla or Amber, I think. They both smell equally nice and both seem to have long lasting power. I do not own this fragrance, but I own Jazz Club so I passed on purchasing this. Try both out and see which one matches your chemistry.

This is my new favorite fragrance! It has a warm elegance to it, with a lot of amber to it. It does not smell gourmand to me as described, more soft and cozy and rich, like a cream colored cashmere blanket, or a faux fur throw. The fragrance reminds me of something my mother wore when I was in grade school. The first whiff gave me a huge flash-back to that time in my life, but I can't put my finger on quite what it is. But I love it. It's beautiful and perfect. Not spicy or sexy. Just soft and elegant.  My only regret? It doesn't last long at all. Maybe 4 hours. Every Commodity perfume I've bought only lasts a couple hours. But the smells are so fun and unique that I'll just keep spraying.
This is the first time I have bought something without actually smelling it, but I do not regret it one bit. It is my favourite scent now! I'm definitely going to buy the full sized one
This is warm and alluring an amazing! It lasted over 10 hours on my skin. I need that full size haha!

bought (travel size) blindly, as no testers are available at any of my local Sephora stores. not something i'd normally do, since purchasing fragrance based solely on an online description is exactly like buying wine you've never tried based on the label's description.  in this case, it completely worked out. the very 1st word that comes to mind when i smell this is chic. it's warm & soft (but not too soft). don't think i love it enough to drop the cash on the $100 full size, but i'm very very happy with the travel size, and would definitely get it again.  for reference...my absolute favorite fragrance is Dior Addict (the original), so if that's too powerful for you, this is a mellower alternative.

I just received the purse sized version, and will immediately be purchasing the full. I put it on an hour ago and it has unfolded beautifully on my skin. I get a big whiff of vanilla at first, but there's sandalwood, amber, and a very soft musk as it warms. I absolutely love it.

I hate to ruin the 5 star run, but I can't quite go there. I purchased this without bothering to sample, after all, it featured a good number of my favorite notes: amber, sandalwood, vanilla, tonka beans, a touch of musk works, so long as we aren't going all 80s, Jovan Musk! Side note, but is it just me or does every note list these days start with Bergamot? lol Any way, when I first tried this fragrance, I immediately patted myself on the back for a good call. Although I did naturally wait for the dry down and was still loving it...later on, something stuck me as wrong! I started to worry if I really did like this scent, there was suddenly something that reminded me of...what? I couldn't place it. Since then, I have decided that although that discordant note does hit me once in a while, I still really enjoy this fragrance. As I look at the full list now, I am suspecting that it may very well be the camphor that is throwing me. Not that I am a traditionalist, I do often like things that are a bit edgy or non-conformist...but is camphor a note that I would pick when designing a scent, thinking maybe not. So all said, there are 10 notes listed for this fragrance and I think that I am enjoying 9 out of 10 (so yes, mathematically, 4.5 should be my rating! lol), just occasionally struck by that one note! And, what the heck, perfect is boring!
very long-lasting, very vanilla on me, a sensual fragrance. 1 spritz is enough
The tonka bean in this is what makes my heart sing. Its slightly powdery, but modern. I am obsessed with it and it lasts all day!
Sexy,long-lasting scent. It warms to the skin, for a genuine smell.
